title: 2008년 Johnson, Michael Wesley 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Johnson, Michael Wesley. 판결일: 2008-03-05. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Johnson, Michael Wesley
**판결일**: 2008-03-05
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약



















IN THE COURT OF CRIMINAL APPEALS


OF TEXAS






NO. WR-66,247-02






EX PARTE MICHAEL WESLEY JOHNSON, Applicant








ON APPLICATION FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS


CAUSE NO. 03-09-9829-B IN THE 24TH  DISTRICT COURT


FROM DEWITT COUNTY






	Per curiam.


O R D E R



	Pursuant to the provisions of Article 11.07 of the Texas Code of Criminal Procedure, the
clerk of the trial court transmitted to this Court this application for writ of habeas corpus.  Ex parte
Young, 418 S.W.2d 824, 826 (Tex. Crim. App. 1967).  Applicant was convicted of aggravated
assault causing bodily injury and sentenced to twenty  years' imprisonment and a ten thousand dollar
fine.   

	Applicant contends that his counsel rendered ineffective assistance because  counsel failed
to timely file a notice of appeal.  

	Applicant has alleged facts that, if true, might entitle him to relief.  Strickland v. Washington,
466 U.S. 608 (1984); Ex parte Lemke, 13 S.W.3d 791,795-96 (Tex. Crim. App. 2000).   In these
circumstances, additional facts are needed.  As we held in Ex parte Rodriguez, 334 S.W.2d 294, 294
(Tex. Crim. App. 1960), the trial court is the appropriate forum for findings of fact.  The trial court
shall provide counsel with the opportunity to respond to Applicant's claim of ineffective assistance
of counsel on appeal.  The trial court may use any means set out in Tex. Code Crim. Proc. art.
11.07, § ...
